title: Bookkeeping & Financial Tracking for James Bond Cosplay Charity Contest (NFT Prize Fund)
summary: I’d love to support your upcoming James Bond look-alike cosplay charity contest, especially since the proceeds will be donated to an orphanage in the form of $5,000 worth of 007 NFTs. My goal is to ensure full financial transparency, accurate recording of funds, and a clear audit trail for both participants and donors. By providing professional bookkeeping, I’ll help your team build trust, demonstrate accountability, and maximize the long-term impact of this charitable initiative.

contact.name: Tilly Burzinsky
contact.title: Events Lead
contact.bio: Dynamic events professional specializing in large-scale corporate and cultural events. Expert in creating memorable experiences that bring communities together.

milestones.title: Phase 1 – Research & Financial Setup
milestones.description: Analyse the contest structure, NFT wallet systems, and any legal or tax implications. Set up a secure bookkeeping framework for tracking incoming funds, NFT transfers, and contest-related expenses. Deliver a ledger template and reporting workflow for clear oversight.
